keyword: how many calories in a donut hole
title: How Many Calories in a Donut Hole?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a donut hole, including carbs, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in a Donut Hole?
assumptions: Standard glazed yeast donut hole, ~18g, store-bought style like Dunkin', fried dough with sugar glaze, no filling.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, size, frying method, and toppings. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One glazed donut hole provides ~52 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a donut hole from Dunkin'?
faqs.a: About 52 kcal for a standard glazed one; varies slightly by flavor.

faqs.q: Are donut holes high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, ~3.2 g sugars per donut hole, mainly from the glaze.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in a donut hole?
faqs.a: Around 2.5 g total fat, with 1.2 g saturated, due to frying.

faqs.q: How many carbs in one donut hole?
faqs.a: Approximately 7.1 g carbs, including 0.2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Do homemade donut holes have fewer calories?
faqs.a: Possibly, if baked instead of friedâ€”could be 30-40 kcal each, depending on recipe.
